programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!

programme.title: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!

programme.title: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding's beauty prove too enchanting?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!

programme.title: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding's grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!

programme.title: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!

programme.title: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can't even bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!

programme.title: The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister, and Big Mom loses her wits!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!

programme.title: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!

programme.title: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats' plan goes awry, and all hope looks to be lost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Launcher Blasts! The Moment of Big Mom's Assassination!

programme.title: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom's troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege's stronghold - with the full force of the Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, it's only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!

programme.title: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom's castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can't resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile, the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Escape From the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Execution Begins! Luffy's Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!

programme.title: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape, which involves some parting of ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle Collapses! The Straw Hat’s Great Escape Begins!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!

programme.title: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom's word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!

programme.title: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn't stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses, and Pudding's changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!

programme.title: Mama's onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero's mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!

programme.title: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny's Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!

programme.title: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom's naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure

programme.title: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro's sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm, which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!

programme.title: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!

programme.title: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous – but little do they know the plan is overheard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy’s Silent Fight!

programme.title: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!

programme.title: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile, at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

programme.title: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!

programme.title: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!

programme.title: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully, but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth… and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: Automata, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: The Over the Hill Gang, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals help to clean up a lawless town, run by a crooked mayor.

programme.title: The Over the Hill Gang Rides Again, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Retired Texas Ranger Nash Crawford re-assembles his former Ranger outfit from the old days to fight crime in his hometown.

programme.title: The Old West, (1952, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tames and sells wild horses to a stagecoach line. His only competitor ambushes and shoots Gene, who is nursed back to health. A wild stagecoach race to test Gene's horses is arranged.

programme.title: Heart Of The Rio Grande, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tames a spoiled teenage shrew sent to a Dude Ranch for the summer and in the process humanizes her father into being a better parent. Action includes stampeding horses, and a bold rescue!

programme.title: The Strawberry Roan, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Gene’s first color film stars Champion in the title role as a wild outlaw stallion, branded a killer, and the two-fisted cowboy who fights off a gun-crazed posse to win justice for the noble animal.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: The Score, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: When safe cracker Nick decides it's time to settle down with his girlfriend Diane and stick to his legitimate business, running a jazz nightclub, his friend and partner Max has other plans.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: The Score, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: When safe cracker Nick decides it's time to settle down with his girlfriend Diane and stick to his legitimate business, running a jazz nightclub, his friend and partner Max has other plans.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: As the members of the group remain helpless, Negan takes action that will forever haunt those who survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be

programme.title: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A group of Alexandrians embarks on a journey; one member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The stakes continue to grow higher as paths cross; the group enacts an intricate plan.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life

programme.title: Rick and his group, along with the Kingdom and Hilltop, have banded together to bring the fight to Negan and the Saviors.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A strange new flu is causing everyone to get sick, including the Sailor Guardians. Minako takes it upon herself to look after her sick friends.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Artemis is out to prove he is capable after being teased by Luna. He encounters a suspicious-looking man who is gathering stray animals.
programme.sub-title: Artemis's Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The school test results are posted, and Ami is at the top of her class. She finds herself becoming isolated after rumors that she cheated on the test.
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After being out sick, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa decides to return to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she opens the Door of Space and Time.
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Future: Dimande's Dark Ambition

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask rescues Sailor Moon from Black Moon’s castle. But before they can all celebrate, a giant dragon appears to destroy the Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman brainwashes Chibi-Usa and turns her into the Dark Queen. The Sailor Guardians return to present-day Earth to find her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Queen: Birth of Black Lady

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Saphir learns of Wiseman’s true intentions and tries to warn his brother, only to be attacked by Wiseman himself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The appearance of the giant Malefic Black Crystal Tower is wreaking havoc. Sailor Moon and the Guardians enter the tower to put an end to this.
programme.sub-title: Believing in Love and the Future: Usagi's Decision

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dark Gate opens, and Dark Energy spreads everywhere. To stop this, the Sailor Guardians must defeat Black Lady.
programme.sub-title: The Final Battle Between Light and Dark: Pledge of Love for the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Peace has returned, and the Sailor Guardians take a moment to look back at their past battles as they prepare for their next challenge.
programme.sub-title: Usagi and the Girls' Resolve: Prelude to a New Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new enemy called the Death Busters appears, whose members aim to get their hands on the talismans that can only be found in pure-hearted humans.
programme.sub-title: Premonition of the Apocalypse: The Mysterious New Guardians Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Silver Crystal loses its shine and that means Usagi cannot transform. Mamoru tries to cheer Usagi up.
programme.sub-title: The Rod of Love is Born: Usagi's New Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Minako sneak off to the arcade to take a break. The girls are approached by a handsome student named Haruka Tenoh, who wishes to join them.
programme.sub-title: A Handsome Boy? Haruka Tenoh's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi asks her friends to help her become a better person worthy of being Mamoru’s bride.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Idol: The Graceful Genius Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Motoki’s little sister Unazuki is a pure-hearted girl who dreams of sharing her first kiss with the person she truly loves.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Pure Heart: The Three-Way Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small misunderstanding causes Umino and Naru to believe that the other is no longer interested in them.
programme.sub-title: Let Moon Help with Your Love Problems

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite sets her eyes on Ami, believing that the famous girl genius would possess a pure heart full of confidence.
programme.sub-title: The Labyrinth of Water: Ami Targeted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Realizing that the two mysterious Sailor Guardians Uranus and Neptune are also after the talismans, Kaolinite sends a Daimon to get rid of them.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operações especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a missão de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga prisão. Lá, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres são reveladas, Steele percebe que eles estão presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok. Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: RedBad: A Invasão dos Francos
programme.desc: As lutas pelo poder e as guerras entre o Redbad Frisiano e seu inimigo jurado Pepin de Herstal, Senhor dos Francos.

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacável ex.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Dupla em Fúria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigação cheia de emoção e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operações especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a missão de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga prisão. Lá, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres são reveladas, Steele percebe que eles estão presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok. Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: RedBad: A Invasão dos Francos
programme.desc: As lutas pelo poder e as guerras entre o Redbad Frisiano e seu inimigo jurado Pepin de Herstal, Senhor dos Francos.

programme.title: Confissões de um Filho
programme.desc: Confissões de um filho pródigo é uma versão moderna da história do filho pródigo que Jesus contou.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma história da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela é filha do Rei.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanças
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o verão, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Pé Grande
programme.desc: Depois de um acidente de bicicleta na floresta, Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, Pé Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura, que foi deslocada por um incêndio recente na floresta. Mas quando dois valentões encontram o Pé Grande, eles decidem capturá-lo e explorá-lo comercialmente. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o Pé Grande e devolvê-lo à sua casa.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanças
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o verão, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Perseguido pelo Destino
programme.desc: Em um circuito de corridas, o gângster Gigi (Matthias Schoenaerts), membro de uma cruel gangue criminosa de Bruxelas, conhece a jovem e rica corredora Bibi (Adèle Exarchopoulos). Logo, os dois se apaixonam, mas por causa de suas vidas distintas, a chance de ficarem juntos é remota. Mesmo assim, eles iniciam um relacionamento pelo qual lutarão com unhas e dentes, mas que também colocará suas vidas em perigo.

programme.title: À Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqüestrada, que está agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda está viva. Em uma corrida terrível contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e até mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistério de seu desaparecimento e liberação do cativeiro

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: O Mistério Da Passagem Da Morte
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes norte-americanos viajam para Passagem de Dyatlov em busca de respostas sobre os eventos ocorridos na década de 1950, quando nove esquiadores russos morreram inexplicavelmente. Gravando um documentário, eles percorrem a trilha amaldiçoada dos Montes Urais e logo começam a desconfiar que não estão sozinhos no local.

programme.title: O Segredo da Floresta
programme.desc: Durante uma viagem romântica no interior da Índia, um casal de Los Angeles acidentalmente testemunha o exorcismo assustador de uma menina de 11 anos. Eles decidem resgatá-la.

programme.title: O Exorcismo de Karen Walker
programme.desc: Um casal descobre um dispositivo Kirlian em sua nova casa. Intrigados com o conceito de fotografar a aura das pessoas, eles, sem saber, liberam um mal antigo.

programme.title: Depois da Escuridão
programme.desc: Conforme o sol se apaga, uma família se reúne para enfrentar o fim do mundo, suas esperanças de resgate lentamente diminuem enquanto enfrentam conflitos entre si.

programme.title: História de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera (Sienna Miller), uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemático (Nick Matthews) entrar em seu apartamento. As coisas se complicam quando ele decide atacá-la

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: Esquadrão Antissequestro
programme.desc: Gabriela (Gabriela Simoni), uma menina de onze anos, filha de um jogador de futebol, é sequestrada durante a Copa do Mundo por um grupo de terroristas.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: No Rastro da Violência
programme.desc: Fascinada pelas raízes do comportamento violento, a psicóloga renomada Dra. Amanda Tyler tem a oportunidade de entrevistar e analisar Jackson Shea, prisioneiro do corredor da morte.

programme.title: Profissão de Risco
programme.desc: Jack é contratado por Dragna, um chefão do crime, para realizar uma tarefa aparentemente inocente: ele deve levar uma mala para um motel em Nova Orleans e esperar que ela seja recolhida. Mas Jack nunca conseguirá abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida está em risco. Vários criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defendê-la se quiser viver.

programme.title: À Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqüestrada, que está agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda está viva. Em uma corrida terrível contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e até mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistério de seu desaparecimento e liberação do cativeiro

programme.title: A Filha do Meu Melhor Amigo
programme.desc: A amizade duradoura entre as famílias Walling e Ostroff é testada quando Nina, a filha pródiga de Ostroff, volta para casa nas férias após uma ausência de cinco anos e inicia um caso com David, chefe da família Walling.

programme.title: Meet Bill
programme.desc: Um homem de meia-idade que está cansado de seu trabalho e tem de suportar a infidelidade de sua esposa aceita, com relutância, a tarefa de ser mentor de um adolescente rebelde.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Escândalos no Tabloide
programme.desc: Romance sobre o mundo sensacionalista dos tablóides britânicos. ''Atrás de cada foto há uma história... ''

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos são a época da diversão, então Jonah entende bem do assunto, até que ele recebe um diagnóstico de que ficará infértil em um mês. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso dá errado, só restam três semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: Tempos Difíceis
programme.desc: A vila de Kilcoulin's Leap já foi uma próspera cidade termal e lar de um famoso Poço Sagrado, mas agora oferece pouco emprego para seu povo. Quando um grupo de amigos apresenta um plano para sequestrar um lote de Viagra e vendê-lo no mercado aberto, eles não contam com a resposta vigorosa dos fabricantes do Viagra. Em pânico, eles escondem a carga de Viagra no Poço Sagrado da cidade.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dívida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Mundo adulto
programme.desc: Amy acredita estar destinada a ser poeta e busca orientação com um escritor solitário.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Escândalos no Tabloide
programme.desc: Romance sobre o mundo sensacionalista dos tablóides britânicos. ''Atrás de cada foto há uma história... ''

programme.desc: Se os vinte anos são a época da diversão, então Jonah entende bem do assunto, até que ele recebe um diagnóstico de que ficará infértil em um mês.
